articles.title: Mike Tyson Pummeled "Aggressive" Flyer Over Water Bottle: Report - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Mike Tyson is known for his erratic behaviour - biting off a piece of Evander Holyfield's ear in a 1997 bout.
articles.content: Mike Tyson punched a fellow passenger aboard a JetBlue flight because the aggressive man threw a bottle at him, the boxer's representatives have said in a statement. The former heavyweight champion w… [+1747 chars]
